entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When updating MAUI to WinAppSDK 1.4 PInvoke.SetParent no loner works #20253
  • [Windows] ListView and flicker while scrolling #20252
  • AppShell MenuItem doesn't work for Share functionality #20251
  • [Shell][iOS] No way to set search handler ClearPlaceholderIcon color #20250
  • Visual Studio continues to create extra Apple provisioning profile and updates the maui csproj file with it #20248
  • Tap on item in collectionview opens wrong item after multiple taps #20246
    Backlog
  • Migrate legacy UI tests to Appium #20245
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Grid layout breaks in build target='Release' when ColumnDefinitions defined via StaticResource #20244
    Backlog
  • Icons in Shell TabBar and AppBar are no longer updated after changing the UserAppTheme #20243
  • CollectionView not scrolling on MacCatalyst/macOS #20240
    Backlog
  • FontAutoScalingEnabled doesn't work when used in a ListView template #20236

Closed

  • VerticalStackLayout BackgroundColor is ignored #20157
  • Android app crashes when device font size changed by putting app in background. #20239
  • Android Casting in .Net Maui 8 using Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Cast.Framework Does Not work #20233
  • Navigation between top level pages fail in Unpackaged WinUI application #15180
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.49] Deep Link for Android with .Net Maui error - Error when navigate other page #15192
  • Obsolete ImageSource.FromResource #15225
    .NET 9 Planning
  • DeviceInfo not working in iOS #15315
  • Label text with HorizontalOptions="Center" is not centered when breaking onto more than one line #20149
  • iOS app crashes in release mode on physical device #20175

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update with net9.0 #20254
  • Account for margins on sizes returned from Editor #20249
  • Update Layout API Docs #20247
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • Add Frame observer for UIWindow frame changes #20237
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎

Merged

  • Update VisualElement API Docs #20242
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20158
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Update Template Shell Foreground colour #20152
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    community ✨
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
